noAppointments.youCanSchedule: You can schedule an appointment on VA.gov, or you can call your VA medical center to schedule an appointment.
prepareForVideoVisit.beReadyToTalk: Please be ready to talk about your medications during your video visit to ensure you're getting the best and safest care possible.
prepareForVideoVisit.cameraAndMicrophone: You’ll need to have access to a web camera and microphone. You can use an external camera and microphone if your device doesn’t have one.
prepareForVideoVisit.checkConnection: Check to ensure you have a strong Internet connection before your appointment.
prepareForVideoVisit.connectFromQuietPla: Connect to your video appointment from a quiet, private, and well-lighted location.
prepareForVideoVisit.connectWithWifi: Connect to your appointment using a Wi-Fi network if using your mobile phone, rather than your cellular data network.
prepareForVideoVisit.downloadBasedOnDevi: If you’re using an iPad or iPhone for your appointment, you’ll need to download the VA Video Connect iOS app beforehand. If you’re using any other device, you don’t need to download any software or app before your appointment.
prepareForVideoVisit.joinBy: To connect to your Virtual Meeting Room at the appointment time, click the "Join session" button or the link that's in your confirmation email.
prepareForVideoVisit.reviewEverything: During your video appointment, your provider will want to review all the medications, vitamins, herbs, and supplements you’re taking—no matter if you got them from another provider, VA clinic, or local store.
prepareForVideoVisit.title: Prepare for video visit page
prepareForVideoVisit.toHaveBestExperienc: To have the best possible video experience, we recommend you:
pastAppointmentDetails.title: Past Appointment
pastAppointmentDetails.toScheduleAnother: To schedule another appointment, please visit VA.gov or call your VA medical center.
title: Appointments
upcomingAppointmentDetails.addToCalendar: Add this appointment to your device's calendar
upcomingAppointmentDetails.callNumberA11: Dials this number via your device’s call function
upcomingAppointmentDetails.howToJoin: How to join your video appointment
upcomingAppointmentDetails.howToJoinInst: You must join this video meeting from the ATLAS (non-VA) location listed below.
You can join VA Video Connect 30 minutes prior to the start time
You can join this video meeting using a device provided by VA.
You must join this video meeting from the VA location listed below.
upcomingAppointmentDetails.howToJoinVirt: How to join your virtual session
upcomingAppointmentDetails.toCancelThisA: To cancel this appointment, please call the facility or visit VA.gov.
upcomingAppointmentDetails.useCode: You will use this code to find your appointment using the computer provided at the site.
upcomingAppointments.confirmedApptsDispl: Your confirmed appointments are displayed below. Appointments that have been requested but not yet confirmed are not shown.
upcomingAppointments.connectAtAtlas: VA Video Connect at an ATLAS location
upcomingAppointments.connectGFE: VA Video Connect using a VA device
upcomingAppointments.connectOnsite: VA Video Connect at a VA location
